;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§   
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§   Trigger 
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger emeralds_girion
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and CharFactionType mongols
	  and IsFactionLeader
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists emeralds_girion

    AcquireAncillary emeralds_girion chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dorwinion_wine1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Dorwinion
	  and IsGeneral	
	  and TimeInRegion > 4

    AcquireAncillary dorwinion_wine chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dorwinion_wine2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Elven-Mirkwood
	  and IsGeneral	
	  and TimeInRegion > 4

    AcquireAncillary dorwinion_wine chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dorwinion_wine3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Esgaroth
	  and IsGeneral	
	  and TimeInRegion > 4

    AcquireAncillary dorwinion_wine chance 3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shire_wine1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Shire
	  and IsGeneral	
	  and TimeInRegion > 4

    AcquireAncillary shire_wine chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shire_wine2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Bywater
	  and IsGeneral	
	  and TimeInRegion > 4

    AcquireAncillary shire_wine chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shire_wine3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Southfarthing
	  and IsGeneral	
	  and TimeInRegion > 4

    AcquireAncillary shire_wine chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger orc_draught1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and IsGeneral
	  and TimeInRegion > 4
          and CultureType eastern_european
          
    AcquireAncillary orc_draught chance  2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger orcrist
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Erebor
          and TimeInRegion > 2
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Chivalry < -2

    AcquireAncillary orcrist chance 10

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger arkenstone
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Erebor
          and TimeInRegion > 0
 	  and FactionType moors
	  and HasAncType orcrist
          and Attribute Chivalry < -4

    AcquireAncillary arkenstone chance 5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger raven_erebor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd 
    Condition EndedInSettlement 
      	  and TimeInRegion >= 4
	  and SettlementName Erebor

    AcquireAncillary raven_erebor chance 2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger crebain_dunland1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd 
    Condition EndedInSettlement 
      	  and TimeInRegion >= 4
	  and SettlementName Dunland

    AcquireAncillary crebain_dunland chance 3

;-----------------------------------------------
Trigger crebain_dunland2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd 
    Condition EndedInSettlement 
      	  and TimeInRegion >= 4
	  and SettlementName Dunland-Hills

    AcquireAncillary crebain_dunland chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger horsemaster
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and PercentageUnitCategory cavalry > 66

    AcquireAncillary horsemaster chance 50

;-----------------------------------------------
Trigger ranger_north1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd 
    Condition EndedInSettlement 
      	  and TimeInRegion >= 3
	  and FactionType turks
	  and SettlementName Weather-Hills

    AcquireAncillary ranger_north chance 5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger ranger_north2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd 
    Condition EndedInSettlement 
      	  and TimeInRegion >= 3
	  and FactionType sicily
	  and SettlementName Weather-Hills

    AcquireAncillary ranger_north chance 5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger honey_cakes
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd 
    Condition EndedInSettlement
      	  and TimeInRegion >= 3
	  and HasAncType beorn2
	  
    AcquireAncillary honey_cakes chance 5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger cram1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists = city_hall
          and FactionType scotland
          and TimeInRegion >= 4 

    AcquireAncillary cram chance 5

;----------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists = city_hall
          and FactionType moors
          and TimeInRegion >= 4 

    AcquireAncillary cram chance 5

;----------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists = city_hall
          and TimeInRegion >= 3 
          and FactionType egypt

    AcquireAncillary kingsfoil chance 5

;----------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists = city_hall
          and TimeInRegion >= 3 
          and FactionType mongols

    AcquireAncillary kingsfoil chance 5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger book_marzabul
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Misty-Mountains
          and TimeInRegion >= 4 
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists book_marzabul
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary book_marzabul chance 2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger guardian_carrock
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Lowest-Anduin-Vale
          and TimeInRegion >= 5 
          and IsGeneral
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists guardian_carrock

    AcquireAncillary guardian_carrock chance 100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger guardian_high_pass1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName High-Pass
          and TimeInRegion >= 5 
          and IsGeneral
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists guardian_high_pass
          and FactionType hre

    AcquireAncillary guardian_high_pass chance 100

;----------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName High-Pass
          and TimeInRegion >= 5 
          and IsGeneral
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists guardian_high_pass
          and FactionType portugal

    AcquireAncillary guardian_high_pass chance 100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and TimeInRegion > 3 
          and IsGeneral
	  and SettlementBuildingExists = barons_stables
	  and FactionType france

    AcquireAncillary warg chance 5

          and TimeInRegion > 3 
          and IsGeneral
	  and SettlementBuildingExists = barons_stables
	  and FactionType england

    AcquireAncillary warg chance 5

          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists writings_isildur
          and IsGeneral
	  and FactionType sicily

    AcquireAncillary writings_isildur chance 100

	  and FactionType milan

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger ent_draught
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Fangorn
	  and IsGeneral
	  and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and I_EventCounter Fangorn_proposal_accepted > 0
          
    AcquireAncillary ent_draught chance  25

;------------------------------------------
Trigger steward_gondor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd	
    Condition IsFactionLeader
	  and FactionType sicily
          
    AcquireAncillary steward_gondor chance  100 

;------------------------------------------	
Trigger prince_dol_amroth
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd	
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Belfalas
	  and FactionType sicily
	  and IsGeneral
	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists prince_dol_amroth
          	
    AcquireAncillary prince_dol_amroth chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd	
    Condition IsFactionLeader
	  and FactionType sicily
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists troops_gondor

    AcquireAncillary troops_gondor chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and IsGeneral
          and TimeInRegion > 5
	  and SettlementName Belfalas
          and not FactionwideAncillaryExists dol_amroth_officer

    AcquireAncillary dol_amroth_officer chance 20

	  and SettlementName Umbar
	  and FactionType spain
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= dockyard
	  and IsGeneral
	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists harad_fleet
          	
    AcquireAncillary harad_fleet chance  50

;§§§  Weapons 1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger slasher1
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and FactionType hre
          
    AcquireAncillary slasher chance  20

;------------------------------------------
Trigger slasher2
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and FactionType portugal
          
    AcquireAncillary slasher chance  20

;---------------------------------------------- 
Trigger gondor_blade
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction sicily
;          and not HasAncType weapon1
	  
    AcquireAncillary gondor_blade chance  8

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger rohan_blade
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction milan
;          and not HasAncType weapon1
          
    AcquireAncillary rohan_blade chance  8

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger dale_blade
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction scotland
;          and not HasAncType weapon1
          
    AcquireAncillary dale_blade chance  8

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger eriador_blade
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction turks
	  and I_EventCounter union_accepted < 1
;          and not HasAncType weapon1
          
    AcquireAncillary eriador_blade chance  8

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger numenor_blade
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction turks
	  and I_EventCounter union_accepted > 0
;          and not HasAncType weapon1
          
    AcquireAncillary numenor_blade chance  8

;----------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction moors
;          and not HasAncType weapon1
          
    AcquireAncillary dwarf_blade chance  8

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger axe_lossarnach
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction sicily
;          and not HasAncType weapon2 
          
    AcquireAncillary axe_lossarnach chance  5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger spear_huorn
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction france
;          and not HasAncType weapon2	  
          
    AcquireAncillary spear_huorn chance  5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger spear_rhovanion
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction scotland
;          and not HasAncType weapon2  
          
    AcquireAncillary spear_rhovanion chance  5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger balchoth_warspear
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction venice
;          and not HasAncType weapon2  
          
    AcquireAncillary balchoth_warspear chance  5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger bow_galadhrim
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction mongols
	  and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 90

    AcquireAncillary bow_galadhrim chance  20

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger hunters_spear
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
          and TimeInRegion > 30 
          and IsGeneral
	  and not CultureType eastern_european
	  and not CultureType greek
;          and not HasAncType weapon2

    AcquireAncillary hunters_spear chance 2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger hunters_bow
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
          and TimeInRegion > 45
          and IsGeneral
	  and not CultureType eastern_european
	  and not CultureType greek
;          and not HasAncType weapon2

    AcquireAncillary hunters_bow chance 2

;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
;§§§  Weapons misc
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger arrows_lorien
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction mongols
            
    AcquireAncillary arrows_lorien chance  10

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger cloak_nargothrond
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction mongols
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists cloak_nargothrond
          
    AcquireAncillary cloak_nargothrond chance  5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger helm_elbereth
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction egypt
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists helm_elbereth
                    
    AcquireAncillary helm_elbereth chance  5

;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
;§§§  Unique Weapons
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger gimli_axe2
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc gimli_axe

    AcquireAncillary gimli_axe chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger gimli_axe_small2
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc gimli_axe_small

    AcquireAncillary gimli_axe_small chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger blade_khamul2
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc blade_khamul

    AcquireAncillary blade_khamul chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger glamdring2
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc glamdring

    AcquireAncillary glamdring chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger staff_gandalf2 
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc staff_gandalf

    AcquireAncillary staff_gandalf chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger haldhafang2
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc haldhafang

    AcquireAncillary haldhafang chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger herugrim2 
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc herugrim

    AcquireAncillary herugrim chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger anduril2
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc anduril

    AcquireAncillary anduril chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger staff_saruman2
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc staff_saruman

    AcquireAncillary staff_saruman chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger balin_axe2
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc balin_axe

    AcquireAncillary balin_axe chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger guthwine1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition IsGeneral
	  and FactionType milan
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists guthwine	  
          
    AcquireAncillary guthwine chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger guthwine3
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc guthwine

    AcquireAncillary guthwine chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger helms_blade1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd	
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Helms-Deep
          and FactionType milan
	  and IsGeneral
	  and TimeInRegion > 12
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists helms_blade	  
          
    AcquireAncillary helms_blade chance  3

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger helms_blade3
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc helms_blade

    AcquireAncillary helms_blade chance  100


;lurtz bow
;black_arrow
;aeglos
;witchking_helmet

;§§§    Shields
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_gondor
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction sicily
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_gondor chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_rohan
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction milan
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_rohan chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_dale
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction scotland
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_dale chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_eriador
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction turks
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_eriador chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_dwarves
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction moors
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_dwarves chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_high_elves
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction egypt
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_high_elves chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_silvan_elves
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction mongols
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_high_elves chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_isengard
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction france
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_isengard chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_harad
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
          and GeneralFoughtFaction spain
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_harad chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_rhun
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction venice
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_rhun chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_mordor
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction england
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_mordor chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_oom
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction hre
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_oom chance 5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_oog
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
	  and IsGeneral
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction portugal
;          and not HasAncType shield

    AcquireAncillary shield_oog chance 5

;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
;§§§  Armour
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_city_armourer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= armourer
          and Attribute Command > 4
          and not HasAncType custom_armour

    AcquireAncillary armour_custom chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_castle_armourer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_armourer
          and Attribute Command > 4
          and not HasAncType custom_armour

    AcquireAncillary armour_custom chance  3

;------------------------------------------
Trigger building_smithy_city
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished > armourer
          and not HasAncType custom_armour

    AcquireAncillary armour_custom chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger building_smithy_castle
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished > c_armourer
          and not HasAncType custom_armour

    AcquireAncillary armour_custom chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_poor_fighter
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    Condition Attribute Command < 4
          and I_TurnNumber > 2
          and not HasAncType custom_armour

    AcquireAncillary armour_ornate chance  50

;----------------------------------------------
;----------------------------------------------
Trigger gondor_armour
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction sicily
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary gondor_armour chance  20

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger rohan_armour
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction milan
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary rohan_armour chance  20

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger dale_armour
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction scotland
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary dale_armour chance  20

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger eriador_armour
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction turks
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary eriador_armour chance  20

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger dwarf_armour
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction moors
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary dwarf_armour chance  20

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger noldor_armour
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction egypt
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary noldor_armour chance  20

;----------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction mongols
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary slivan_armour chance  20

;----------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction england
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary orc_armour chance  20

;----------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction france
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary isengard_armour chance  20

    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction hre
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary oom_armour chance  20

          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction portugal
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary oog_armour chance  20

    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction spain
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary harad_armour chance  20

;----------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction venice
;          and not HasAncType armour
          
    AcquireAncillary rhun_armour chance  20

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger mithril_west
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction moors

    AcquireAncillary mithril_west chance 20

;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
;§§§    Banners
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger banner_tree
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction sicily
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_tree
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_tree chance  80

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger banner_mearas
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction milan
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_mearas
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_mearas chance  80

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger banner_dale
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction scotland
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_dale
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_dale chance  80

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger banner_erebor
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction moors
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_erebor
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_erebor chance  80

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger banner_eriador
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction turks
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_eriador
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_eriador chance  80

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger banner_stars
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction egypt
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_stars
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_stars chance  80

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger banner_silvan
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction mongols
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_silvan
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_silvan chance  80

;----------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction france
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_isen
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_isen chance  80

;----------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction hre
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_oomm
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_oomm chance  80

          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction portugal
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_oog
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_oog chance  80

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction england
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_mordor
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_mordor chance  80

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction spain
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_harad
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_harad chance  80

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= crushing
          and IsGeneral   
	  and GeneralFoughtFaction venice
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists banner_rhun
          
    AcquireAncillary banner_rhun chance  80

;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§
;§§§  Music
;§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§§

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger lorien_harp
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
          and IsGeneral   
	  and CultureType greek
          and GovernorBuildingExists >= artist_gallery
          and not HasAncType music
          
    AcquireAncillary lorien_harp chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger gondor_horn
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
          and IsGeneral   
	  and FactionType sicily
          and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= fairground
          and not HasAncType music
          
    AcquireAncillary gondor_horn chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger hobbit_flute
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Shire
          and IsGeneral
          and TimeInRegion > 4
	  and I_EventCounter Shire_proposal_accepted > 0
          
    AcquireAncillary hobbit_flute chance  5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger dale_music
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
          and IsGeneral   
	  and FactionType scotland
          and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= fairground
          and not HasAncType music
          
    AcquireAncillary dale_music chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger dwarf_music
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
          and IsGeneral   
	  and FactionType moors
          and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= fairground
          and not HasAncType music
          
    AcquireAncillary dwarf_music chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger orc_drum1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
          and IsGeneral   
	  and CultureType eastern_european
          and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= militia_drill_square
          and not HasAncType music
          
    AcquireAncillary orc_drum chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger orc_drum2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
          and IsGeneral   
	  and CultureType eastern_european
          and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= barracks
          and not HasAncType music
          
    AcquireAncillary orc_drum chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger rhun_flute
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
          and IsGeneral   
	  and FactionType venice
          and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= fairground
          and not HasAncType music
          
    AcquireAncillary rhun_music chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger rohan_horn
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
          and IsGeneral   
	  and FactionType milan
          and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= fairground
          and not HasAncType music
          
    AcquireAncillary rohan_horn chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger harad_horn
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
          and IsGeneral   
	  and FactionType spain
          and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= fairground
          and not HasAncType music
          
    AcquireAncillary harad_horn chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger nenya_city
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Eregion
	  and IsGeneral
	  and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists nenya
            
    AcquireAncillary nenya chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger nenya_trigger
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc nenya

    AcquireAncillary nenya chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger narya_city
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Mithlond
	  and IsGeneral
	  and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists narya
            
    AcquireAncillary narya chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger narya_trigger
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc narya

    AcquireAncillary narya chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger vilya_city
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Imladris
	  and IsGeneral
	  and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists vilya
            
    AcquireAncillary vilya chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger vilya_trigger
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc vilya

    AcquireAncillary vilya chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger ring_barahir_city
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and SettlementName Weather-Hills
	  and IsGeneral
	  and TimeInRegion > 3
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists ring_barahir
            
    AcquireAncillary ring_barahir chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger ring_barahir_trigger
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition FatherAnc ring_barahir

    AcquireAncillary ring_barahir chance  100

;$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$

;------------------------------------------
Trigger radagast1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd	
    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Chivalry > 6
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists radagast
          
    AcquireAncillary radagast chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger radagast2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd	
    Condition IsGeneral	
	  and EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementName Lowest-Anduin-Vale
          and Attribute Chivalry > 4
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists radagast
          
    AcquireAncillary radagast chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger alatar
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd	
    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and Attribute Chivalry > 6
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists alatar
          
    AcquireAncillary alatar chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shadowfax
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd	
    Condition IsGeneral	
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists shadowfax
	  and Trait Gandalf = 1
          
    AcquireAncillary shadowfax chance  4

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger galadrim
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral   
	  and FactionType mongols
	  and IsRegionOneOf Lothlorien_Province Celebrant_Province
          
    AcquireAncillary galadrim chance  5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger ranger_ithilien
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral   
	  and FactionType sicily
	  and IsRegionOneOf Ithilien_Province South-Ithilien_Province North-Ithilien_Province
          
    AcquireAncillary ranger_ithilien chance  5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger elf_friend
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	  and EndedInSettlement
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= farms+2
	  and TimeInRegion > 3
          and not CultureType middle_eastern
          and not CultureType eastern_european
          and not CultureType southern_european
          and not CultureType greek

    AcquireAncillary elf_friend chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger dwarf_friend
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	  and EndedInSettlement
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= mines
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
          and not CultureType middle_eastern
          and not CultureType eastern_european
          and not CultureType southern_european
          and not CultureType greek

    AcquireAncillary dwarf_friend chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger rider_rohan
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
	  and FactionType milan 
             
    AcquireAncillary rider_rohan chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger shield_maiden
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and CultureType northern_european
          and Attribute Chivalry > 5

    AcquireAncillary shield_maiden chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger gollum
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	  and HasAncType relic_ring
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists gollum

    AcquireAncillary gollum chance  5

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger menac_uruk
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and CultureType eastern_european
          and not FactionType hre
          and not FactionType portugal
          and Attribute Authority > 5
   
    AcquireAncillary menac_uruk chance  3

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger troll
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	  and EndedInSettlement
          and CultureType eastern_european
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= troll_cage
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
             
    AcquireAncillary troll chance  3

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger snaga_slave
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and CultureType eastern_european
          and Attribute Authority > 4
             
    AcquireAncillary snaga_slave chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger black_numenorian
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType england
          and not Trait Witchking > 0
          and not Trait Nazgul > 0
             
    AcquireAncillary black_numenorian chance  2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger black_numenorian2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd	
    Condition IsFactionLeader
	  and FactionType spain
   	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists black_numenorian
          
    AcquireAncillary black_numenorian chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger worshipper_morgoth
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and IsGeneral
          and CultureType eastern_european
	  and SettlementBuildingExists = church
	  and TimeInRegion > 15

    AcquireAncillary worshipper_morgoth chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger worshipper_morgoth2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and IsGeneral
          and CultureType eastern_european
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= abbey
	  and TimeInRegion > 20

    AcquireAncillary worshipper_morgoth chance  5 

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger trainer_mumakil
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	  and EndedInSettlement
          and FactionType spain
	  and SettlementBuildingExists = c_earls_stables
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
             
    AcquireAncillary trainer_mumakil chance  3

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger wainrider
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and FactionType venice
             
    AcquireAncillary wainrider chance  2

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger troll_captain
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	  and EndedInSettlement
          and CultureType eastern_european
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= troll_cage
	  and TimeInRegion > 20
             
    AcquireAncillary troll_captain chance  3

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger cavetroll_trainer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	  and EndedInSettlement
          and CultureType eastern_european
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= troll_cage
	  and TimeInRegion > 20
          and not FactionType france
             
    AcquireAncillary cavetroll_trainer chance  3

;----------------------------------------------

    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and IsGeneral
	  and CultureType eastern_european
	  and SettlementBuildingExists > church
	  and TimeInRegion > 30
             
    AcquireAncillary witch chance  4

	  and CultureType eastern_european
	  and SettlementBuildingExists >= abbey
	  and TimeInRegion > 30

          and FactionType milan
	  and IsGeneral
	  and TimeInRegion > 10

	  and IsGeneral
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists smith_hollin

Trigger human_head
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and CultureType eastern_european
	  and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 90
	  and GeneralFoughtCulture northern_european

    AcquireAncillary human_head chance  20

    Condition WonBattle
          and IsGeneral
          and CultureType eastern_european
	  and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 90
	  and GeneralFoughtCulture gondor

    AcquireAncillary human_head chance  20

          and IsGeneral

	  and PercentageEnemyKilled >= 90
	  and GeneralFoughtCulture middle_eastern

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger old_toby
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	  and EndedInSettlement
	  and SettlementName Bree
	  and not IsFactionLeader
	  and not IsFactionHeir
	  and SettlementBuildingExists = farms+2
	  and TimeInRegion > 3
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists old_toby

    AcquireAncillary old_toby chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_castle_with_stables_dread
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= knights_stables
          and Attribute Chivalry < -4

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents12
    WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait HighPersonalSecurity < 1

    AcquireAncillary bodyguard chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents16
    WhenToTest SabotageMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and I_TurnNumber > 85

    AcquireAncillary explosives chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents42a
    WhenToTest DenouncementMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = inquisitor

    AcquireAncillary executioner chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents53
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary secret_love chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agent59
    WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt
    Condition AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary royal_escort chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_prim3
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Prim >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary smothering_bodyguard chance  20

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Girls >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary stunning_handmaiden chance  50

    Condition FatherTrait Perverted >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary stunning_handmaiden chance  50

    Condition FatherTrait Paranoia >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary delicate_blade chance  100

          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary smothering_bodyguard chance  75

    Condition FatherTrait SpyMaster >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary delicate_blade chance  100

    Condition FatherTrait AssassinMaster >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary delicate_blade chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherAttribute Authority > 4
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary faithful_servant chance  100

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Aesthetic >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary fine_cosmetics chance  100

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= theatre
          and IsGeneral

;------------------------------------------
Trigger adultress_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= coaching_house
          and IsGeneral
          and IsMarried
          and SpouseAttribute Charm < 6
          and Attribute Chivalry < 3

    AcquireAncillary adultress chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger adultress_foreign_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition InEnemyLands
          and IsMarried
          and TimeInRegion > 3
          and Trait Loyal < 0
          and Attribute Chivalry < 3

    AcquireAncillary adultress_foreign chance  5

    AcquireAncillary architect chance  3

          and Attribute Command >= 4

          and Trait Drink >= 1
          and IsGeneral

Trigger lancebearer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= jousting_lists
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command > 3

    AcquireAncillary lancebearer chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger librarian_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= gondor_alchemists_lab
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary librarian chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger librarian_vnv_trigger2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= gondor_library
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary librarian chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger magician_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Superstitious >= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= alchemists_lab
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= fairground

    AcquireAncillary magician chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger magician_pagan_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition not AtSea
          and IsGeneral
          and PopulationOwnReligion < 90
          and PopulationHeretic >= 50
          and not Trait Superstitious > 0

    AcquireAncillary magician_pagan chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger master_mason_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= m_masons_guild

    AcquireAncillary master_mason chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger master_of_archers_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= archery_range
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary master_of_archers chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger master_of_archers_vnv_trigger2
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished = marksmans_range

    AcquireAncillary master_of_archers chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger master_of_archers_vnv_trigger3
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished = c_marksmans_range

    AcquireAncillary master_of_archers chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger master_of_assassins_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest LeaderOrderedAssassination

    AcquireAncillary master_of_assassins chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger master_of_assassins_vnv_trigger2
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= m_assassins_guild

    AcquireAncillary master_of_assassins chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger master_of_horse_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest GovernorUnitTrained
    Condition TrainedUnitCategory cavalry
          and SettlementBuildingExists > knights_stables
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary master_of_horse chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger master_smith_vnv_trigger2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= armourer
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary master_smith chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger master_smith_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= swordsmiths_guild

    AcquireAncillary master_smith chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger master_smith_vnv_trigger2
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= armourer

    AcquireAncillary master_smith chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger master_smith_vnv_trigger3
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= c_armourer

    AcquireAncillary master_smith chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger mathematician_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = gondor_university
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary mathematician chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger mentor_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition IsGeneral
          and FatherAttribute Authority >= 2

    AcquireAncillary mentor chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger mercenary_captain_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest HireMercenaries

    AcquireAncillary mercenary_captain chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger military_engineer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= city_watch
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= catapult_range
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary military_engineer chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger military_engineer_vnv_trigger2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= drill_square
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_catapult_range
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary military_engineer chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger money_counter_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= fairground
          and Treasury > 50000
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary money_counter chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger musician_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= theatre
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary musician chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger naval_navigator_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition IsAdmiral
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= explorers_guild

    AcquireAncillary naval_navigator chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger nosy_mother_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterMarries
    Condition Trait Girls >= 1

    AcquireAncillary nosy_mother chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger obsessed_suitor_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest DiplomacyMission
    Condition AgentType = princess
          and Attribute Charm > 4

    AcquireAncillary obsessed_suitor chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger overseer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= farms+2
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary overseer chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger pet_bloodhound_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AssassinationMission
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and MissionSucceeded
          and not InEnemyLands

    AcquireAncillary pet_bloodhound chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger pet_guard_dog_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= castle
          and IsGeneral
          and TimeInRegion > 4

    AcquireAncillary pet_guarddog chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger pet_monkey_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= market
          and AgentType = spy
          and not CultureType northern_european
          and not CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary pet_monkey chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger physician_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageOfArmyKilled > 50
          and FactionBuildingExists = gondor_university
          and IsGeneral
          and not CharacterReligion islam

    AcquireAncillary physician chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger physician_vnv_trigger_islam
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageOfArmyKilled > 50
          and FactionBuildingExists >= bimaristan
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary physician chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger pickpocket_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= market

    AcquireAncillary pickpocket chance  12 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger quartermaster_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= army_barracks
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command > 3

    AcquireAncillary quartermaster chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger runner_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition not Routs
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary runner chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger scout_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and not WasAttacker
          and InEnemyLands
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary scout chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger scribe_ancillary_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= town_hall
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= gondor_alchemy_school
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary scribe_ancillary chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shieldbearer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 80
          and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 5
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary shieldbearer chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shipwright_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest NewAdmiralCreated
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= merchants_wharf

    AcquireAncillary shipwright chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger siege_engineer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= catapult_range
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary siege_engineer chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_catapult_range
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary siege_engineer chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= siege_works

    AcquireAncillary siege_engineer chance  33 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= c_siege_works

    AcquireAncillary siege_engineer chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger slaver_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition CharacterReligion catholic
          and Attribute Chivalry < -3

    AcquireAncillary slaver chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger soothsayer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition not WonBattle

    AcquireAncillary soothsayer chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spymaster_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest LeaderOrderedSpyingMission
    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary spymaster chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spymaster_vnv_trigger2
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= thieves_guild

    AcquireAncillary spymaster chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyglass_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= dockyard

    AcquireAncillary spyglass chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger strapping_stallion_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition AgentType = princess
          and FactionBuildingExists = kings_stables

    AcquireAncillary strapping_stallion chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger swift_steed_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and FactionBuildingExists >= horse_breeders_guild

    AcquireAncillary swift_steed chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger swordbearer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 5
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary swordbearer chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger tax_farmer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition Trait BadTaxman >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary tax_farmer chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger torturer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest ExterminatePopulation
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait StrategyDread > 1

    AcquireAncillary torturer chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger translator_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= market
          and AgentType = diplomat

    AcquireAncillary translator chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger treasurer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = great_market
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary treasurer chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trick_abacus_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= town_hall

    AcquireAncillary trick_abacus chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trusty_steed_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= earls_stables
          and Trait GoodCavalryGeneral >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary trusty_steed chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trusty_steed_vnv_trigger2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= c_earls_stables
          and Trait GoodCavalryGeneral >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary trusty_steed chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger tutor_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Ignorance <= 1

    AcquireAncillary tutor chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger veteran_warrior_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 5
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and IsGeneral
          and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 50

    AcquireAncillary veteran_warrior chance  25 
		
;----------------------------------------------
Trigger palantir_authorisation_trigger1
	;all factions
	WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition IsFactionLeader
		and CharacterIsLocal
		and not FactionwideAncillaryExists palantir_authorisation
		and I_EventCounter pal_sauron_local_and_in_barad == 0
		and FactionBuildingExists >= elostirion_palantir

	AcquireAncillary palantir_authorisation chance 100

;Trigger one_ring_city1
;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;    Condition EndedInSettlement	
;	  and SettlementName Central_Mountains
;	  and IsGeneral
;	  and TimeInRegion > 2
;	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
;            
;    AcquireAncillary one_ring chance  5
;

;Trigger one_ring_city2
;    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
;    Condition EndedInSettlement	
;	  and SettlementName High-Pass
;	  and IsGeneral
;	  and TimeInRegion > 2
;	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
;            
;    AcquireAncillary one_ring chance  3

;    Condition EndedInSettlement

;	  and IsGeneral

;	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
;            
;    AcquireAncillary one_ring chance  3

;Trigger one_ring_battletrigger
;    WhenToTest PostBattle
;    Condition WonBattle
;	  and IsGeneral
;          and GeneralWithAncKilled relic_ring
;
;   AcquireAncillary one_ring chance  100
;
;----------------------------------------------
;Trigger one_ring_trigger
;    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
;    Condition FatherAnc one_ring
;
;    AcquireAncillary one_ring chance  100
;
;----------------------------------------------
;Trigger witchking

;################################################# New triggers

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger one_ring_city1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and I_EventCounter ring_hobbiton > 0
	  and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed < 1
	  and SettlementName Shire
	  and CharacterReligion catholic
	  and CharacterIsLocal
	  and IsGeneral 
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            
    AcquireAncillary one_ring chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger one_ring_city2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and I_EventCounter ring_imladris > 0
	  and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed < 1
	  and SettlementName Imladris
	  and CharacterReligion catholic
	  and CharacterIsLocal
	  and IsGeneral 
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            
    AcquireAncillary one_ring chance  100

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger one_ring_city3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and I_EventCounter ring_anorien > 0
	  and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed < 1
	  and SettlementName Anorien
	  and CharacterReligion catholic
	  and CharacterIsLocal
	  and IsGeneral 
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            
    AcquireAncillary one_ring chance  100	

;----------------------------------------------
Trigger one_ring_city4
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and I_EventCounter ring_edoras > 0
	  and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed < 1
	  and SettlementName Kings-Land
	  and CharacterReligion catholic
	  and CharacterIsLocal
	  and IsGeneral 
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            
    AcquireAncillary one_ring chance  100

;----------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
	  and I_EventCounter ring_amroth > 0
	  and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed < 1
	  and SettlementName Belfalas
	  and CharacterReligion catholic
	  and CharacterIsLocal
	  and IsGeneral 
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            
    AcquireAncillary one_ring chance  100
	
;----------------------------------------------

	  and I_EventCounter ring_hornburg > 0
	  and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed < 1
	  and SettlementName Helms-Deep
	  and CharacterReligion catholic
	  and CharacterIsLocal
	  and IsGeneral 
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            
    AcquireAncillary one_ring chance  100

	  and I_EventCounter ring_bree > 0

	  and CharacterReligion catholic

	  and IsGeneral 
	  and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
            
    AcquireAncillary one_ring chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger architect_by_workshops_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= workshop5
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary master_mason chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger architect_by_workshops_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= workshop6
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary master_mason chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger architect_by_workshops_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= workshop7
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary architect chance  1 
    AcquireAncillary master_mason chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger architect_by_workshops_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= workshop8
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary architect chance  1 
    AcquireAncillary master_mason chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger architect_by_workshops_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= workshop9
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary architect chance  1 
    AcquireAncillary master_mason chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger architect_by_goldsmith_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= goldsmith5 
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary architect chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger architect_by_goldsmith_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= goldsmith6 
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary architect chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger architect_by_goldsmith_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= goldsmith7 
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary architect chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger architect_by_goldsmith_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= goldsmith8 
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary architect chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger architect_by_goldsmith_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	  and TimeInRegion > 5
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= goldsmith9 
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary architect chance  1
